statements: DELETE FROM dapp_statistics WHERE user_engagement_score > 4.5 AND date_created < '2021-10-01';
DELETE FROM dapp_usage_statistics WHERE usage_count < 10 AND engagement_level >= 5;
DELETE FROM blockchain_network WHERE network_type = 'private' AND creation_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM dapp_usage_stats WHERE user_id = 123 AND dapp_name = 'App1';
DELETE FROM blockchain_network WHERE network_id = 456 AND block_height = 789;
DELETE FROM blockchain_network WHERE network_id = 5 AND block_height < 10000;
DELETE FROM user_engagement WHERE user_id = 10 AND engagement_metric = 'likes' AND engagement_value > 50;
DELETE FROM dapp_transactions WHERE user_id = 1 AND amount > 1000;
